alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 12 at 2:36PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Numerous flash floods likely with significant events possible. * WHERE...A portion of south Texas, including the following areas, Aransas Islands, Bee, Calhoun Islands, Coastal Aransas, Coastal Calhoun, Coastal Kleberg, Coastal Nueces, Coastal Refugio, Coastal San Patricio, Goliad, Inland Calhoun, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces, Inland Refugio, Inland San Patricio, Jim Wells, Kleberg Islands, Live Oak, Nueces Islands and Victoria. * WHEN...From 7 PM CDT this evening through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Extensive street flooding is possible and roads may become impassable. Significant flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low lying and flood prone locations is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - 3 to 7 inches of rain is forecast to fall Friday evening through Monday. Isolated higher amounts are likely. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. The Weather Prediction Center is forecasting a Moderate Risk for flash flooding. The probability for numerous significant flash floods has increased. There is an increased danger to lives and property due to flash flooding.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio
